title: Cuisinart Single Serve Brewing System Commercial
description: Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-Cups®—featuring over two hundred varieties of pre-measured, premium brand coffee and tea—this brewer's innovative one-touch technology makes it easier than ever for consumers to enjoy a wide array of hot beverages.

asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText: Perfect for both personal use and entertaining, this single-serve home-brewing system offers consumers fresh gourmet coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more in under one minute. Using Keurig K-Cups®—featuring over two hundred varieties of pre-measured, premium brand coffee and tea—this brewer's innovative one-touch technology makes it easier than ever for consumers to enjoy a wide array of hot beverages.
